attributes.action: Cruelty to horses/ponies a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details: 3/4 horses died in this woman’s care and left to rot. Another few horses rescued but in extremely neglected condition.
attributes.background: I am petitioning to help stop cruelty to horses . I have heard of a case that I think is disgusting which led to the death of several horses and the deterioration in health of other horses.owner took pleasure in torturing these animals . left malnourished and extremely unhealthy.3/4 found dead .

rejection.details:
Animal cruelty is already a criminal offence under the Animal Welfare Act 2006, so we're not sure what other action you'd like Government or Parliament to take.

If you're concerned about a specific incident, you may wish to report it directly to the RSPCA:

https://www.rspca.org.uk/utilities/contactus/reportcruelty
